text: Zafra exilis is a small species of sea snail in the family Columbellidae, the dove snails. ==Description== The shell size is approximately 3.7 mm. ==Distribution== This species is distributed in the Red Sea and as an introduced species along the Canary Islands. ==References== * Vine, P. (1986). Red Sea Invertebrates. Immel Publishing, London. 224 pp. * exilis Category:Gastropods described in 1849
title: Zafra exilis
